summary: Three estranged high school friends reunite for an unexpected road trip to rehab. Forced together for a few grueling days, they just might reconnect .. if they don't kill each other first.
cast: Patrick John Flueger|Kumail Nanjiani|Andrew W. Walker|Alexandra Holden|Robert R. Shafer|Michael Shamus Wiles|Natalie Distler|Riya Ray|Courtenay Taylor|Kevin Fry|Donna Pieroni|Frederick Lawrence|Liz Jenkins|Dennis Wong|Ron Rogg√©|Jeff Austin
title: Loaded
